name: Freegull '98
description:
Freegull '98

You are a seagull, a LOWLY and INSIGNIFICANT beast. In order to achieve any amount of greatness you must CONSUME! There are PITIFUL MORSELS of food strewn about the DESOLATE WASTES. Hunt them down with great resolve and you will grow LESS INSIGNIFICANT. Other creatures will sustain you as well but ONLY IF THEY ARE LESSER BEINGS. Murder and consume everything and perhaps you will GAIN THE SIGNIFICANCE YOU SO CRAVE!

Controls

Press 'A' on your controller (or UP ARROW) to accelerate
Press 'B' on your controller (or DOWN ARROW) to decelerate
The left stick (or WASD) is used for movement
Start (or escape) will return you to the title screen

Miscellaneous

This was built in Godot, for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT game jam.
